inputs.remark:
Ordered list: Add HADS and caloric testing.
V2: Add initial & follow‑up PTA; tympanometry; vestibular evaluation details (bithermal caloric normal, Dix‑Hallpike/roll negative, pursuit/saccades normal, Valsalva negative, platform pressure normal).

logic_summary: Added HADS and Caloric testing to the ordered list.
Updated V2 Vestibular Evaluation result summary to include specific details (caloric, Dix-Hallpike, pursuit/saccades, Valsalva, platform pressure) as requested.
Initial and Follow-up PTA were already present in V2, so no changes were made to those entries.

value.rationale_short: To screen for anxiety and depression as part of the vestibular evaluation.
To assess peripheral vestibular function (lateral semicircular canals).

value.name: Tympanometry
value.result_summary: Normal middle ear pressure and compliance bilaterally; multiple-peaked tympanogram in the right ear.

patch_ops.value: VNG, Rotary Chair, and Posturography normal. Bithermal caloric normal, Dix‑Hallpike/roll negative, pursuit/saccades normal, Valsalva negative, platform pressure normal. VEMPs normal left, absent right (likely secondary to middle ear surgeries).
